note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Project earth
tagline: A open source game still in its shoes. its about saving earth. you see earth and questions pop up. each answer affects earth. any help, especially code , is welcome! you need flashdeveloper and flixler.
body:
**THIS GAME IS NOT FINISHED**
We therefor can _use_ some help.
to help, you can make art and code.
it is allowed to make changes, but please, make them carefully.

**What i need**
Flashdeveloper and Flixler are neccesary to create, photoshop and gimp are possible the better art making programs.
for sound, honestly, we have no idea.
